node.excerpt: I saw a black cat but then it died, I saw a magpie and thus I cried, I found a penny but passed it by, I found a dead bird and gave a sigh…
Admittedly I wrote this drunk, And performed it yet more drunker, I thought I could keep time & rhyme, Slurring words between sips of wine…
Sailing through silk thin air at height, Making good way to see new sights, Excitement escaping with the wind, Nigh is the time to forget…
